sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function HowItWorks() { return (

How StreamSync Works

Create a Room

Start by creating a watch room and invite your friends with a simple link. No downloads required.

Sync Playback

Our technology ensures everyone's stream stays perfectly synchronized, even with different internet speeds.

Chat & React

Share your reactions in real-time with built-in chat, emojis, and video reactions with friends.

); } export default HowItWorks;
